meanings.sent1: The paneless room felt open and spacious.
meanings.sent2: The house had a paneless design, allowing for a clear view outside.
meanings.sent3: The paneless wall made it easy for the cat to climb up and down.
meanings.sent4: Her paneless gaze seemed to see right through me.
meanings.sent5: The paneless sky stretched endlessly above us.

meanings.sent1: The old cabin had a paneless window covered with a curtain.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned building had broken, paneless windows.
meanings.sent3: He tried to open the paneless window, but it was stuck.
meanings.sent4: The paneless view from the top of the hill was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The paneless room was chilly in the winter.
